code:
classDiagram
  class Dbhandler {
    +__construct()
    +conn() mysqli
  }
  class CommonUtil {
    +productExists(image)
    +uidExists(loginName)
    +setUser(username,pwd,email,privilege,attempt)
    +setProduct(name,brand,desc,cat,price,qty,image)
    +EmptyInputSelect(value)
  }
  class Member {
    -memberID
    -username
    -email
    -privilegeLevel
    -cart : OrderContr
    -orders : OrderContr[]
    +hasCart()
    +hasPreviousOrder()
  }
  class Item {
    -itemID
    -name
    -brand
    -description
    -category
    -quantityInStock
    -image
    -reviews : Review[]
    +HasReviews()
    +checkSoldCount()
  }
  class OrderContr {
    -orderID
    -orderItems : OrderItemContr[]
    +getOrderItems()
  }
  class OrderItemContr {
    -orderItemID
    -itemID
    -price
    -quantity
  }
  class Review {
    -username
    -rating
    -feedback
  }
  class LoginContr { -username -pwd +LoginUser() }
  class SignupContr { -username -pwd -repeatPwd -email +createUser() }
  class ProfileContr { -username -pwd -repeatPwd -email -memberID +updateUserAccount() }
  class Admin { +searchMember() +showProduct() +inspectUser() }

  Dbhandler <|-- CommonUtil
  Dbhandler <|-- Member
  Dbhandler <|-- Item
  Dbhandler <|-- OrderContr
  Dbhandler <|-- OrderItemContr
  CommonUtil <|-- LoginContr
  Dbhandler <|-- SignupContr
  CommonUtil <|-- ProfileContr
  Dbhandler <|-- Admin
  OrderContr "1" o--> "*" OrderItemContr
  Item "1" o--> "*" Review
  Member "1" o--> "1" OrderContr : cart
  Member "1" o--> "*" OrderContr : orders
